channel.title: kiwi on Novice Husband... among other things
channel.description: Recent content in kiwi on Novice Husband... among other things

item.title: Daylight Hours
item.description: What I am used to Coming from South Africa, Johannesburg, I am used to daylight hours in Summer being around 13:30 and Winter around 10:30.

item.title: Kia Ora Aotearoa
item.description: “Kia Ora Aotearoa!” Kia Ora means Hello in Māori, and Aotearoa means Long White Cloud, which is the Māori name for New Zealand. How it all came to pass Tanja got a work offer that allowed us to move to New Zealand.
